name: Tales from Tarrece: Castaway
description:
*This game is currently in early testing, the core mechanics are present so I'm just looking for some general feedback as I continue to add more content*

In epochs past, three sibling deities travelling the cosmos happened upon a star around which three planets spun. Deciding to take one for themselves and mold it to their own image, each planet became home to plethora of wonderous creatures and industrious sentient life.

This is the grimdark fantasy world of Tarrece. You wake up on an uncharted island, the only survivor of a tragic zeppelin malfunction. You must use your wits and bravery to survive and explore the landscape in search of some way home.

Tales from Tarrece: Castaway is a minimalist survival adventure inspired by games like Kingdom: Two Crowns, Rust, and Dark Souls. With a hand drawn 2d aesthetic and intense pixel perfect combat, I'm aiming to deliver modern controls and a satisfying gameplay loop in a small package.
